metadata.title: Function differences by product model name

sections.content:
Question:
Is there a way to check whether or not functions are available by product model name?
Answer:
Refer to “1.2 Product List” in the hardware manual. 
Caution: The product model name differs depending on whether or not the JTAG, SubOSC, and CANFD functions are available, so select a model name according to the functions to be used. In addition, the model name differs depending on the ROM size, temperature range, and package.
Suitable Products
RX660
